hint.text: First rearrange the terms in the dividend and divisor in order of degree and look for any common values.

solution.text:
Notice that \(_{j}_\) is common to all terms.
\(=_{j}_(t^3-6t^2+t+24)\)
Now perform long division as shown above :
Therefore, \(\frac{_{{24*j}}_+_{j}_t-_{{6*j}}_t^2+_{j}_t^3}{t-3}\)
\(=_{j}_(t^2-3t-8)\)
